pullrequest.title: patches to get drcsim working with simbody

content.raw: The gravityMode connects to WorldUpdateBegin, while SetLinkStatic connects to WorldUpdateEnd. This is probably splitting hairs, but `gravityModeConnection` and `staticLinkConnection` could probably share a single connection if they could agree on what to connect to.
content.html: The gravityMode connects to WorldUpdateBegin, while SetLinkStatic connects to WorldUpdateEnd. This is probably splitting hairs, but gravityModeConnection and staticLinkConnection could probably share a single connection if they could agree on what to connect to.
